basics.name: Joshua Shannon
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: Innovative Software Architect with experience across multiple stacks including ASP.NET WebForms and MVC, PHP/Laravel, Node, MySQL, MSSQL and MongoDb . Forward-thinker, adept at designing systems that meet the needs of today, and are ready for the demands of tomorrow. Technology is my second language and code is my playground.

highlights: Development of an API to generate REST APIs from data sources such as CSV files, Web APIs and SQL servers
Backend development of V1 and V2 of Gov2Go Mobile Application using PHP and REST hosted in AWS
Architect and development of a system extension for processing Trademark filings for Arkansas Secretary of State's Business and Commercial Services using ASP.NET WebForms

work.summary: Development and Maintenance of the Arkansas Secretary of State's Business and Commercial Services filing application using ASP.NET WebForms.
Development of Client websites utilizing PHP, CSS and Javascript.
Manage a team of 3 Developers and coordinate projects with a team of 3 Producers while also implementing new product features.
highlights: Architect and Development of an ASP.NET Content Management System used as starting point for Client websites
Development of tools and libraries to improve code reuse among the development staff

volunteer.summary: Work with other representatives to manage the LRKA under Larry Betz (Poo)

education.institution: University of Arkansas at Little Rock
